actions.name: CancelTimer
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel a previously started timer and record a TimerCanceled event in the history

actions.name: CancelWorkflowExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to close the workflow execution and record a WorkflowExecutionCanceled event in the history

actions.name: CompleteWorkflowExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to close the workflow execution and record a WorkflowExecutionCompleted event in the history

actions.name: ContinueAsNewWorkflowExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to close the workflow execution and start a new workflow execution of the same type using the same workflow ID and a unique run Id

actions.name: CountClosedWorkflowExecutions
actions.description: Grants permission to return the number of closed workflow executions within the given domain that meet the specified filtering criteria

actions.name: CountOpenWorkflowExecutions
actions.description: Grants permission to return the number of open workflow executions within the given domain that meet the specified filtering criteria

actions.name: CountPendingActivityTasks
actions.description: Grants permission to return the estimated number of activity tasks in the specified task list

actions.name: CountPendingDecisionTasks
actions.description: Grants permission to return the estimated number of decision tasks in the specified task list

actions.name: DeleteActivityType
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified activity type

actions.name: DeleteWorkflowType
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified workflow type

actions.name: DeprecateActivityType
actions.description: Grants permission to deprecate the specified activity type

actions.name: DeprecateDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to deprecate the specified domain

actions.name: DeprecateWorkflowType
actions.description: Grants permission to deprecate the specified workflow type

actions.name: DescribeActivityType
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about the specified activity type

actions.name: DescribeDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about the specified domain, including its description and status

actions.name: DescribeWorkflowExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about the specified workflow execution including its type and some statistics

actions.name: DescribeWorkflowType
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about the specified workflow type

actions.name: FailWorkflowExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to close the workflow execution and record a WorkflowExecutionFailed event in the history

actions.name: GetWorkflowExecutionHistory
actions.description: Grants permission to return the history of the specified workflow execution

actions.name: ListActivityTypes
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about all activities registered in the specified domain that match the specified name and registration status

actions.name: ListClosedWorkflowExecutions
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of closed workflow executions in the specified domain that meet the filtering criteria

actions.name: ListDomains
actions.description: Grants permission to return the list of domains registered in the account

actions.name: ListOpenWorkflowExecutions
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of open workflow executions in the specified domain that meet the filtering criteria

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for an AWS SWF resource

actions.name: ListWorkflowTypes
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about workflow types in the specified domain

actions.name: PollForActivityTask
actions.description: Grants permission to workers to get an ActivityTask from the specified activity taskList

actions.name: PollForDecisionTask
actions.description: Grants permission to deciders to get a DecisionTask from the specified decision taskList

actions.name: RecordActivityTaskHeartbeat
actions.description: Grants permission to workers to report to the service that the ActivityTask represented by the specified taskToken is still making progress

actions.name: RecordMarker
actions.description: Grants permission to record a MarkerRecorded event in the history

actions.name: RegisterActivityType
actions.description: Grants permission to register a new activity type along with its configuration settings in the specified domain

actions.name: RegisterDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to register a new domain

actions.name: RegisterWorkflowType
actions.description: Grants permission to register a new workflow type and its configuration settings in the specified domain

actions.name: RequestCancelActivityTask
actions.description: Grants permission to attempt to cancel a previously scheduled activity task

actions.name: RequestCancelExternalWorkflowExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to request that a request be made to cancel the specified external workflow execution

actions.name: RequestCancelWorkflowExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to record a WorkflowExecutionCancelRequested event in the currently running workflow execution identified by the given domain, workflowId, and runId

actions.name: RespondActivityTaskCanceled
actions.description: Grants permission to workers to tell the service that the ActivityTask identified by the taskToken was successfully canceled

actions.name: RespondActivityTaskCompleted
actions.description: Grants permission to workers to tell the service that the ActivityTask identified by the taskToken completed successfully with a result (if provided)

actions.name: RespondActivityTaskFailed
actions.description: Grants permission to workers to tell the service that the ActivityTask identified by the taskToken has failed with reason (if specified)

actions.name: RespondDecisionTaskCompleted
actions.description: Grants permission to deciders to tell the service that the DecisionTask identified by the taskToken has successfully completed

actions.name: ScheduleActivityTask
actions.description: Grants permission to schedule an activity task

actions.name: SignalExternalWorkflowExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to request a signal to be delivered to the specified external workflow execution and records

actions.name: SignalWorkflowExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to record a WorkflowExecutionSignaled event in the workflow execution history and create a decision task for the workflow execution identified by the given domain, workflowId and runId

actions.name: StartChildWorkflowExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to request that a child workflow execution be started

actions.name: StartTimer
actions.description: Grants permission to start a timer for a workflow execution

actions.name: StartWorkflowExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to start an execution of the workflow type in the specified domain using the provided workflowId and input data

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag an AWS SWF resource

actions.name: TerminateWorkflowExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to record a WorkflowExecutionTerminated event and force closure of the workflow execution identified by the given domain, runId, and workflowId

actions.name: UndeprecateActivityType
actions.description: Grants permission to undeprecate a previously deprecated activity type

actions.name: UndeprecateDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to undeprecate a previously deprecated domain

actions.name: UndeprecateWorkflowType
actions.description: Grants permission to undeprecate a previously deprecated workflow type

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from an AWS SWF resource
